title: The Block's villain Jesse and girlfriend Mel slam Mitch and Mark's house
text:
The Block's Jesse and Mel slammed rivals Mitch and Mark on the show on Sunday.

It came after the 'stylish grandpas' won the room reveal this week and beat the pair by half a point.

Villain Jesse didn't hold back, saying to camera that he'd be sick on the floor in their house and that it looks like a 'public toilet.'

'I'd walk in and be sick on the floor': The Block's villain Jesse and girlfriend Mel (pictured) slammed Mitch and Mark's house after they beat them in the latest reveal by half a point on Sunday... saying it looks like a 'public toilet'

'I think the judges 100 per cent got the decision wrong,' Jesse said to camera after the judging.

Mel also raged about the boys' spare bedroom which had a Kate Moss portrait on the wall.

'Kate Moss, whatever, a fur coat... I'm not going to be like "I want that house because did you see the fur coat on the bed?"

Furious: Mel also raged about the boys' spare bedroom which had a Kate Moss portrait on the wall (pictured)

Well done! Mitch and Mark (pictured) won the week scoring 26 points out of a possible 30

Jesse added: 'I'd walk in the house and go "I'm about to be sick on the floor here, because it looks like a public toilet. I don't think I'll buy this.'

He went on, saying: 'I'm really pleased that they made the design choice they did with the floor plan, as I think it's actually they've taken themselves out of the competition and everyone has a better chance to win.'

Mitch and Mark won the week scoring 26 points out of a possible 30.

Jesse and Mel finished on 25.5 points.

Ouch! Meanwhile on the show, the judges (pictured) slammed Scott Cam, saying that he gave them too much work to do this week, because some of the teams couldn't finish the spaces

Meanwhile on the show, the judges slammed Scott Cam, saying that he gave them too much work to do this week, because some of the teams couldn't finish the spaces.

'I think its fair to say Scotty has bitten off more than they can chew,' judge Darren Palmer said.

Scotty joked after: 'I'm down in the dumps now, sounds like I'm getting a low score this week.'
description: The Block's Jesse and Mel slammed rivals Mitch and Mark on the show on Sunday.
authors: Chloe-Lee Longhetti For Daily Mail Australia
